And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth. Full Compare GBN ACC Barnes FBN JFB JWN MHC MHCC PNTC RWP SDC Teacher TSK Edit Jr, Edit MyNotes, Edit RevJRRSr 7 For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one. Full Compare GBN ACC Barnes JFB JWN PNTC RWP SDC Teacher TSK WBN Edit Jr, Edit MyNotes, Edit RevJRRSr 8 And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one. Full Compare ACC Barnes FBN JFB JWN PNTC RWP Teacher TSK WBN Edit Jr, Edit MyNotes, Edit RevJRRSr 9 If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son. Mt 3:16-17; 17:5; Joh 8:17-18; 14:17; 15:26; 16:13; 19:34; 1Ti 3:16 Full Compare GBN ACC Barnes FBN JFB JWN MHCC PNTC RWP TSK WBN Edit Jr, Edit MyNotes, Edit RevJRRSr 10 � He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son. Joh 1:1; 3:33; 5:38; 10:30; Ro 8:16; Ga 4:6; Re 19:13 Full Compare GBN ACC Barnes FBN JFB JWN MHC PNTC RWP TSK Edit Jr, Edit MyNotes, Edit RevJRRSr

Spiritual Vision for Increasing Victory

TEXT: I John 5:1-5

There is a place in God where He can ALWAYS cause us to triump!

vs. 1 You cannot be saved without faith in Jesus Christ.

  1. Receiving Faith: Importance of the Word, Mix Word with Faith.
